Greedy Joker.description: Played cards with Diamond suit give +3 Mult when scored

Lusty Joker.description: Played cards with Heart suit give +3 Mult when scored

Wrathful Joker.description: Played cards with Spade suit give +3 Mult when scored

Gluttonous Joker.description: Played cards with Club suit give +3 Mult when scored

Jolly Joker.description: +8 Mult if played hand contains a Pair

Zany Joker.description: +12 Mult if played hand contains a Three Of A Kind

Mad Joker.description: +10 Mult if played hand contains a Two Pair

Crazy Joker.description: +12 Mult if played hand contains a Straight

Droll Joker.description: +10 Mult if played hand contains a Flush

Sly Joker.description: +50 Chips if a played hand contains a Pair

Wily Joker.description: +100 Chips if a played hand contains a Three Of A Kind

Clever Joker.description: +80 Chips if a played hand contains a Two Pair

Devious Joker.description: +100 Chips if a played hand contains a Straight

Crafty Joker.description: +80 Chips if a played hand contains a Flush

Half Joker.description: +20 Mult if played hand contains 3 or fewer cards

Joker Stencil.description: x1 Mult for each empty Joker Slot. Joker Stencil included

Four Fingers.description: All Flushes and Straights can be made with 4 cards

Mime.description: Retrigger all card held in hand abilities

Ceremonial Dagger.description: When Blind is selected, destroy Joker to the right and permantly add double its sell value to this Mult

Marble Joker.description: Adds one Stone card to the deck when Blind is selected

8 Ball.description: 1 in 4 chance for each played 8 to create a Tarot card when scored (Must have room)

Dusk.description: Retrigger all played cards in final hand of the round

Raised Fist.description: Adds double the rank of lowest ranked card held in hand to Mult

Fibonacci.description: Each played Ace, 2, 3, 5, or 8 gives +8 Mult when scored

Steel Joker.description: Gives x0.2 Mult for each Steel Card in your full deck

Scary Face.description: Played face cards give +30 Chips when scored

Delayed Gratification.description: Earn $2 per discard if no discards are used by the end of the round

Pareidolia.description: All cards are considered face cards

Gros Michel.description: +15 Mult. 1 in 6 chance this is destroyed at the end of round.

Even Steven.description: Played cards with even rank give +4 Mult when scored (10, 8, 6, 4, 2)

Odd Todd.description: Played cards with odd rank give +31 Chips when scored (A, 9, 7, 5, 3)

Scholar.description: Played Aces gives +20 Chips and +4 Mult when scored

Business Card.description: Played face cards have a 1 in 2 chance to give $2 when scored

Supernova.description: Adds the number of times poker hand has been played this run to Mult

Ride the Bus.description: This Joker gains +1 Mult per consecutive hand played without a scoring face card

Space Joker.description: 1 in 4 chance to upgrade level of played poker hand

Egg.description: Gains $3 of sell value at end of round

Burglar.description: When Blind is selected, gain +3 Hands and lose all discards

Blackboard.description: x3 Mult if all cards held in hand are Spades or Clubs

Runner.description: Gains +15 Chips if played hand contains a Straight

Ice Cream.description: +100 Chips. -5 Chips for every hand played

DNA.description: If first hand of round has only 1 card, add a permanent copy to deck and draw it to hand

Splash.description: Every played card counts in scoring

Blue Joker.description: +2 chips for each remaining card in deck

Sixth Sense.description: If first hand of round is a single 6, destroy it and create a Spectral card (Must have room)

Constellation.description: This Joker gains x0.1 Mult every time a Planet card is used

Hiker.description: Every played card permanently gains +5 Chips when scored

Faceless Joker.description: Earn $5 if 3 or more face cards are discarded at the same time

Green Joker.description: -1 Mult per hand played. -1 Mult per discard

Superposition.description: Create a Tarot card if poker hand contains an Ace and a Straight (Must have room)

To Do List.description: Earn $4 if a poker hand is a f[hand], poker hand changes at end of round

Cavendish.description: x3 Mult. 1 in 1000 chance this card is destroyed at the end of round

Card Sharp.description: x3 Mult if played poker hand has already been played this round

Red Card.description: This Joker gains +3 Mult when any Booster Pack is skipped

Madness.description: When Small Blind or Big Blind is selected, gain x0.5 Mult and destroy a random Joker

Square Joker.description: This Joker gains +4 Chips if played hand has exactly 4 cards

Seance.description: If poker hand is a Straight Flush, create a random Spectral card

Riff-Raff.description: When Blind is selected, create 2 Common Jokers (must have room)

Vampire.description: This Joker gains x0.1 Mult per scoring Enhanced card played, removes card Enhancement

Shortcut.description: Allows Straights to be made with gaps of 1 rank (ex: 10 8 6 5 3)

Hologram.description: This Joker gains x0.25 Mult every time a playing card is added to your deck

Vagabond.description: Create a Tarot card if hand is played with $4 or less

Baron.description: Each King held in hand gives x1.5 Mult

Cloud 9.description: Earn $1 for each 9 in your full deck at end of round

Rocket.description: Earn $1 at end of round. Payout increases by $2 when Boss Blind is defeated

Obelisk.description: This Joker gains x0.2 Mult per consecutive hand played without playing your most played poker hand

Midas Mask.description: All played face cards become Gold cards when scored

Luchador.description: Sell this card to disable the current Boss Blind

Photograph.description: First played face card gives x2 Mult when scored

Gift Card.description: Add $1 of sell value to every Joker and Consumable card at end of round

Turtle Bean.description: +5 hand size, reduces by 1 each round

Erosion.description: +4 Mult for each card below f[startingSize] in your full deck

Reserved Parking.description: Each face card held in hand has a 1 in 2 chance to give $1

Mail-In Rebate.description: Earn $5 for each discarded f[rank], rank changes every round

To The Moon.description: Earn an extra $1 of interest for every $5 you have at end of round

Hallucination.description: 1 in 2 chance to create a Tarot card when any Booster Pack is opened (Must have room)

Fortune Teller.description: +1 Mult per tarot card used this run

Stone Joker.description: Gives +25 Chips for each Stone Card in your full deck

Lucky Cat.description: This Joker gains x0.25 Mult every time a Lucky card successfully triggers (currently x1 Mult)

Baseball Card.description: Uncommon Jokers each give x1.5 Mult

Diet Cola.description: Sell this card to create a free Double Tag

Trading Card.description: If first discard of round has only 1 card, destroy it and earn $3

Flash Card.description: This Joker gains +2 Mult per reroll in the shop

Spare Trousers.description: This Joker gains +2 Mult if played hand contains a Two Pair

Ancient Joker.description: Each played card with f[suit] gives x1.5 Mult when scored, suit changes at end of round

Ramen.description: x2 Mult, loses x0.01 Mult per card discarded

Walkie Talkie.description: Each played 10 or 4 gives +10 Chips and +4 Mult when scored

Seltzer.description: Retrigger all cards played for the next f[handsLeft] hands

Castle.description: This Joker gains +3 Chips per discarded f[suit] card, suit changes every round

Smiley Face.description: Played face cards give +5 Mult when scored

Campfire.description: This Joker gains x0.25 Mult for each card sold, resets when Boss Blind is defeated

Golden Ticket.description: Played Gold cards earn $4 when scored

Mr. Bones.description: Prevents Death if chips scored are at least 25% of required chips. self destructs

Acrobat.description: x3 Mult on final hand of round

Swashbuckler.description: Adds the sell value of all other owned Jokers to Mult

Certificate.description: When round begins, add a random playing card with a random seal to your hand

Smeared Joker.description: Hearts and Diamonds count as the same suit, Spades and Clubs count as the same suit

Throwback.description: x0.25 Mult for each Blind skipped this run

Hanging Chad.description: Retrigger first playing card used in scoring 2 additional times

Rough Gem.description: Played cards with Diamond suit earn $1 when scored

Bloodstone.description: 1 in 2 chance for played cards with Heart suit to give x1.5 Mult when scored

Arrowhead.description: Played cards with Spade suit give +50 Chips when scored

Onyx Agate.description: Played cards with Club suit give +7 Mult when scored

Glass Joker.description: This Joker gains x0.75 Mult for every Glass Card that is destroyed

Showman.description: Joker, Tarot, Planet, and Spectral cards may appear multiple times

Flower Pot.description: x3 Mult if poker hand contains a Diamond card, a Club card, Heart card, and Spade Card

Blueprint.description: Copies ability of Joker to the right

Wee Joker.description: This Joker gains +8 Chips when each played 2 is scored

Oops! All 6s.description: Doubles all listed probabilities (ex: 1 in 3 -> 2 in 3)

The Idol.description: Each played f[rank] of f[suit] gives x2 Mult when scored. Card changes every round

Seeing Double.description: x2 Mult if played hand has a scoring Club card and a scoring card of any other suit

Matador.description: Earn $8 if played hand triggers the Boss Blind ability

Hit the Road.description: This Joker gains x0.5 Mult for every Jack discarded this round

The Duo.description: x2 Mult if played hand contains a Pair

The Trio.description: x3 Mult if played hand contains a Three Of A Kind

The Family.description: x4 Mult if played hand contains a Four Of A Kind

The Order.description: x3 Mult if played hand contains a Straight

The Tribe.description: x2 Mult if played hand contains a Flush

Invisible Joker.description: After 2 rounds, sell this card to Duplicate a random Joker (Removes Negative from copy)

Brainstorm.description: Copies the ability of leftmost Joker

Satellite.description: Earn $1 at end of round per unique Planet card used this run

Shoot the Moon.description: Each Queen held in hand gives +13 Mult

Driver's License.description: x3 Mult if you have at least 16 Enhanced cards in your full deck

Cartomancer.description: Create a Tarot card when Blind is selected (Must have room)

Astronomer.description: All Planet cards and Celestial Packs in the shop are free

Burnt Joker.description: Upgrade the level of the first discarded poker hand every round

Canio.description: This Joker gains x1 Mult when a face card is destroyed

Triboulet.description: Played Kings and Queens each give x2 Mult when scored

Yorick.description: This Joker gains x1 Mult every 23 cards discarded

Chicot.description: Disables effect of every Boss Blind

Perkeo.description: Creates a Negative copy of 1 random consumable card in your possession at the end of the shop
